translation.intro-text: Ngwa DA ServePro na-enyere ndị nwe ụlọ ahịa na ndị ọrụ aka ileba anya n'ọrụ ire ahịa nke ọma. Dabara maka F&B, ụlọ ahịa na ọrụ.
translation.feature1-text: Ihe ntanetị dị mfe, ịtụ n'ime sekọnd 3
translation.feature2-text: Nleba anya ozugbo na ngwaọrụ niile
translation.feature3-text: Nchịkọta akpaaka nke ego enwetara, iwu na ihe ndị kacha ere
translation.feature4-text: Tọọ ọrụ na ikike kpọmkwem maka onye ọrụ ọ bụla
translation.feature5-text: A na-ahazi data ma chekwaa ya n'enweghị nsogbu
translation.feature6-text: Izo ya ezo nke abụọ, naanị onye nwe akaụntụ nwere ohere
translation.contact-text: Maka ajụjụ ma ọ bụ enyemaka:
translation.address: Adresị: 52 D1 Street, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Obodo Ho Chi Minh
